title: Basic Numeracy Fluency Improvement Strategies Course for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of arithmetic operations and middle school-level foundational mathematics
context.additional_context: Integration of digital device-enabled online learning modules and offline workshops, emphasizing practical arithmetic skills for application in social sector job roles

learning_goals: Learners can solve 20 unpracticed subtraction problems with an average accuracy of 80% within 2 minutes over 10 weeks.
Learners can conceptually explain 15 or more complex operation problems using the "subtraction as addition" strategy.
Learners can calculate 25 or more out of 30 problems (including addition of 9/8/7) within 3 minutes using the "use-10" strategy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
